outputs.output_descr: Currently, the Seychelles is almost 100% dependent on imported oil to meet its energy needs, including electricity production. The objective of the proposed project is to increase the use of grid-connected photovoltaic (PV) systems as a sustainable means of generating electricity in selected main islands and smaller islands of the Seychelles, with a focus on small-scale producers who are already connected to the national electricity grid.  The project will revise the legal, regulatory and policy framework to better support the adoption of renewable energy technologies, and grid-connected PV sy

document_name: Grid-Connected Rooftop Photovoltaic Systems in Seychelles
Project Completion Report for PV Project
project_title: grid-connected rooftop pv systems in seychelles
